name: @easy6502/app-gnome
description: Learn 6502 assembly by developing games on a virtual console

scripts.build:blueprints: blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/application-window.blp --output src/widgets/application-window.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/preferences-dialog.blp --output src/widgets/preferences-dialog.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/editor.blp --output src/widgets/editor.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/game-console.blp --output src/widgets/game-console.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/display.blp --output src/widgets/display.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/debugger.blp --output src/widgets/debugger.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/message-console.blp --output src/widgets/message-console.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/game-pad.blp --output src/widgets/game-pad.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/hex-monitor.blp --output src/widgets/hex-monitor.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/debug-info.blp --output src/widgets/debug-info.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/learn.blp --output src/widgets/learn.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/source-view.blp --output src/widgets/source-view.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/executable-source-view.blp --output src/widgets/executable-source-view.ui
scripts.build: yarn build:resources && yarn build:blueprints && yarn build:vite
